dialogues.text: He has totally caught the Cowboys by surprise. He sweeps around the right side. The Dallas middle linebacker has recovered and is moving quickly to cut Shane off. But Reese Evans comes out of nowhere and crushes the guy with a flying block. Shane cuts downfield and heads for the end zone with nobody near him, except: For the same safety from the first half who waits for him at the ten. The safety smiles as he takes a bead on Shane. Shane heads right for the guy. He puts his head down and smacks helmets with the safety. The guy goes down and Shane runs over him and into the end zone. AL (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Falco scores! ON McGINTY He jumps into the air.

dialogues.speaker: ON O'NEIL
dialogues.text: He jumps out of bed.

dialogues.speaker: ON TODD, ROD AND BOB
dialogues.text: They jump on each other.

dialogues.speaker: ON ANNABELLE
dialogues.text: She's jumping for joy.

dialogues.speaker: ON SHANE
dialogues.text: He spikes the shit out of the ball.   And then sees something up field. AL (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute. Wait a minute. We've got a flag down. Shane stands stock-still in the end zone watching the REF call the penalty. REF

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clipping. Number 77 offense.

dialogues.speaker: ON MICKEY LEE
dialogues.text: He's wearing number 77 and he collapses in tears.

dialogues.speaker: ON TODD, ROD AND BOB
dialogues.text: They are now sobbing in agony.

dialogues.speaker: ON O'NEIL
dialogues.text: He's being helped back to bed by Augustine.

dialogues.speaker: ON SHANE
dialogues.text: He's walking slowly back to the line of scrimmage. ON McGINTY He looks sick. Shane walks up to Pacifico who is down. His arm is being immobilized by a team trainer. PACIFICO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I broke my arm. (big smile)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. You saved my ass. Shane nods.     In his earpiece, he hears McGinty. McGINTY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someday, you can explain what that was all about. We got no kicker, so you gotta take it in. Your pick. You're the leader.

dialogues.speaker: SHANE
dialogues.text: (to himself) What would Unitas do in this situation? (pause) I have no idea. Shane leans into the huddle.

dialogues.speaker: LEE
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry, Shane. I'm sorry, everybody.

dialogues.speaker: SHANE
dialogues.text: No problem, Mickey. (to Evans) Hell of a hit, Reese.

dialogues.speaker: EVANS
dialogues.text: That's the one I was looking for. I can retire in peace now.

dialogues.speaker: SHANE
dialogues.text: Right after this play. So besides me, who really wants the ball? He looks around the huddle. He studies each face. And then he comes to rest on Brian Murray. Brian's eyes are shining.   He doesn't need words here.

dialogues.speaker: SHANE
dialogues.text: (to Murray) Yeah. You want it, Brian. Let's hook up. (signs as he says it) Blue left slot open 'A' right. Two Jet 'X' drive. On three. Gentlemen, it's been an honor sharing the field of battle. Everybody puts their hands into the middle. They break the huddle with a roar.

dialogues.speaker: ON CLOCK
dialogues.text: Three seconds are showing.

dialogues.speaker: ON LINE OF SCRIMMAGE
dialogues.text: Shane leans over Reese and calls it. SHANE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blue 58! Blue 58! Hut! Hut! Hut! Shane nods.     On the snap, Shane rolls left.

dialogues.speaker: ON REESE EVANS
dialogues.text: He cuts his man at the knees.

dialogues.speaker: ON MICKEY LEE
dialogues.text: He takes two men down.

dialogues.speaker: ON MURRAY
dialogues.text: He cuts on a deep post.

dialogues.speaker: ON SHANE
dialogues.text: He steps up and throws a clean bullet downfield. He roars in pain as he throws it.

dialogues.speaker: ON MURRAY
dialogues.text: The pass is perfect. He pulls it in and beats his man to the end zone. Redskins win.

dialogues.speaker: ON CROWD
dialogues.text: It roars! "Hail to the Redskins" is deafening. Todd, Rod and Bob are screaming. O'Neil kisses Augustine. Annabelle throws a punch into the air. McGinty is all smiles.     Shane walks up to him and they shake hands. Pilachowski and Banes hug. Lee and Andre are hugging and crying. Cochran is on his knees praying.     Reese Evans joins him. Wilkinson hugs Jamal. Clifford Franklin, hometown boy, throws himself into the stands where fans mob him.

dialogues.speaker: ON EDDIE MARTEL
dialogues.text: The Washington Redskins first-string quarterback is so pissed off he jumps up from his seat and turns quickly to go up the steps and out of the stadium. But he slips awkwardly and falls.     He grabs his knee and screams.

dialogues.speaker: ON BRIAN MURRAY
dialogues.text: He's still in the end zone, holding the ball up to the crowd. The roar is deafening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We HEAR NOTHING, but somehow the pure energy of the moment comes through.

dialogues.speaker: ON SHANE
dialogues.text: IN the SILENCE, he's walking in SLOW MOTION toward Annabelle. And everybody is smiling. FADE OUT.
